    @Generated(value="asSymbolicLinkWillBeDeprecatedIgnoringCheckstyle")
public class FileManager
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    This class is not thread-safe. It should be used within one thread only.

           throws IOException

        Throws:

      • overCopyFile

        public boolean overCopyFile(InputStream is,
                   File targetFile)
                     throws IOException
        Copies an inputstream into a file. In case the file already exists, only those bytes are overwritten in the target file that are changed.
        Parameters:
        is - The inputstream of the source.
        targetFile - The file that will be overridden if it is necessary.
        Returns:
        true if the target file had to be changed, false if the target file was not changed.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error during copying the file.
